summary: Among the different questions I am interested in, currently my main project revolves around the subject of communication of personality through playing chess.

Created a workshop for the Museum called [Le Vaisseau](http://www.levaisseau.com/en/). The aim of the workshop was to introduce children between the age of five and twelve to the concepts of AI. For the group activity I was in charge of, I had to build a deep learning system capable of categorizing audio clips, where each clip consisted in a person mimicking the sound of an object or animal. For example, a child would imitate the sound of a car or a lion, and the system would output an image corresponding to a car or a lion, respectively. The system was trained on [Google's Audioset](https://research.google.com/audioset/). The system achieved an 80% accuracy on a test set made of recordings of children mimicking the sound of various objects.
Developed material for the laboratory sessions of the 'Machines and Intelligence' (COM1005) module, whose purpose was to introduce the Nao robot and its Pyton API to students.

Part of the maintenance team for the French newspaper: [Le Monde](https://www.lemonde.fr/en/?preferred_lang=en), whose mission is to fix any problems within the publication software or the company's website.
The main mission was the development of a Web Application to manage the customers of an insurance company, along with their different contracts.

A company, created with Nicolas Ilhe, whose focus was on building website and web-designs. It also provided web hosting services. The purpose of this project was to gain experience in programming, management, and client relationship.
